ch.ethz.rtc.kernel
Class SegmentList

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      java.util.AbstractList<E>
          java.util.ArrayList<Segment>
              ch.ethz.rtc.kernel.SegmentList
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Segment>, java.util.Collection<Segment>, java.util.List<Segment>, java.util.RandomAccess
public class SegmentList
extends java.util.ArrayList<Segment>
implements java.lang.Cloneable

SegmentList represents an ordered list of curve segments.

Since:
Version:
$Id: SegmentList.java 942 2010-07-26 11:39:35Z psimon $

Ernesto Wandeler

checkOrder

public boolean checkOrder()
Returns true if the x-values of the start points of all Segments in this SegmentList are strictly increasing.

Returns:
true if the x-values of the start points of all Segments in this SegmentList are strictly increasing.

trimLT

public void trimLT(double xMax)
Trims this SegmentList by removing all Segments with a start point xStart >= xMax.

Parameters:
xMax - the value from which on Segments are removed.

trimLEQ

public void trimLEQ(double xMax)
Trims this SegmentList by removing all Segments with a start point xStart > xMax.

Parameters:
xMax - the value after which Segments are removed.

concat

public void concat(SegmentList addOn,
                   double xConcat,
                   double yConcat)
Concatenates two SegmentLists. First this SegmentList is trimmed by removing all Segments with xStart >= xConcat. Then the SegmentList addOn is first moved to the point (xConcat,yConcat), and finaly all Segments of the moved addOn are added to this SegmentList.

Parameters:
addOn - the SegmentList to concatenate with this SegmentList.
xConcat - the x-coordinate of the concatenation point.
yConcat - the y-coordinate of the concatenation point.

scaleX

public void scaleX(double factor)
Scales this SegmentList along the x-axis. The factor must be greater than 0.

Parameters:
factor - the factor to scale this SegmentList.

scaleY

public void scaleY(double factor)
Scales this SegmentList along the y-axis.

Parameters:
factor - the factor to scale this SegmentList.

move

public void move(double dx,
                 double dy)
Moves this SegmentList by moving all Segments by (dx, dy).

Parameters:
dx - the value by which this SegmentList is moved on the x-axis.
dy - the value by which this SegmentList is moved on the y-axis.

round

public void round()
Rounds this SegmentList by rounding all Segments.

invert

public void invert()
Inverts this SegmentList.

simplify

public void simplify()
Minimizes the number of Segments in this SegmentList by removing Segments that have the same slope as their predecessor and that start at the same point as their predecessor ends.
